game.name: DJMAX RESPECT V
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 최고의 인기 리듬게임 “DJMAX” 드디어 STEAM 출시!! DJMAX 시리즈의 최신작 'DJMAX RESPECT'가 더 발전된 모습으로 스팀에 첫 발을 내딛습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DJMAX RESPECT V is the latest installment from the creators of the critically acclaimed rhythm game franchise ‘DJMAX.’ Experience tracks from popular artists such as Marshmello, Porter Robinson, and Yukika, exclusive Full HD Music Videos, online multiplayer, new game modes, and more!

reviewHighlights.text: some of the best music in any rhythm game i played unfortunately it's chained to the evil satanic demonic company known as neowiz and their hitlerite...
It's a great game and the songs are amazing, but unfortunately it's an always online game, this makes me question the longevity of the game when the s...
